Text: Hey mirror, you always have some of the best comic uploads! Is there any way we could get the rest of the "The Gunslinger: The Journey Begins" comics now that the run is out? There's even a one-off called "The Gunslinger: Sheemie's Tale", too. It would be badass if you happened to get those up sometime!

I don`t read Gunslinger,I know it`s an awesome series but I just can`t seem to find the time...I`ll see what I can do about that...in the meantime if you`re a batman fan be on the lookout today `cause I got few uploads to do...

Hey man thanks so much! You are my comic lifeline lol. Anyway you could upload Green Lantern, Green Lantern Corps, and Green Lantern:Emerald Warriors fromlike October to now? I have been dying for GL and can't find any. Thanks again!
